Subroutine vom_subhourly

1299 : 
1300 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1301 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1302 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
1303 : !*----water balance and conditions at next time step--------------------
1304 : 
1305 :       subroutine vom_subhourly ()
1306 :       use vegwatmod
1307 :       use vegmod
1308 :       implicit none
1309 : 
1310 :       INTEGER :: init
1311 :       REAL*8  :: dtss
1312 : 
1313 :       init = 0
1314 : 
1315 :       dtmq = 99999.d0
1316 :       if (md_ .gt. 0.d0) then
1317 : !     * avoids mq from becoming larger than mqx or smaller than 0.9mqx
1318 :         if (dmq .gt. 0.d0) then
1319 :           dtmq = (mqx_ - mq_) / dmq
1320 :         elseif (dmq .lt. 0.d0) then
1321 :           dtmq = (0.9d0 * mqx_ - mq_) / dmq
1322 :         endif
1323 :   
1324 :         if (ABS(mq_ - mqss_) .gt. mqx_ / 1.d6) then
1325 :           dtss = (mq_ - mqss_) / (1.d6 * (etm__ - SUM(ruptkvec(:))))
1326 :           if (dtss .le. 0.d0) dtss = 99999.d0
1327 :         else
1328 :           dtss = 99999.d0
1329 :         endif
1330 :       else
1331 :         dtss = 99999.d0
1332 :       endif
1333 : 
1334 :       dtmax = MIN(dtss, dtmq, 3600.d0 - time)
1335 : 
1336 : !     * waterbalance uses dtmax for the determination of dt
1337 :       call waterbalance(init)
1338 : 
1339 :       return
1340 :       end subroutine vom_subhourly
